headline: High Electricity Demand Could Boost These 2 Power Producer Stocks, Says Scotiabank
summary: We rarely give much thought to the power outlet on the wall, yet nearly everything in our modern lives depends on it. From appliances and lighting to computers, entertainment, climate control, and more – all draw on that steady flow of electricity. And that’s just within the home. In cities, where industry, utilities, and communication networks operate on a massive scale, demand for electricity multiplies rapidly. headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Q2 Results Steadied by Data Center, VPP Momentum
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the best dividend stocks to buy. In Q2 2025, the company released mixed earnings, and investors were not as impressed despite the management’s positive outlook. In Q2, NRG reported adjusted earnings per share of $1.73, up 8% from the previous year, while maintaining its 2025 guidance. The company’s […]
